DataElement.preferredName: Prior Therapy Last Therapeutic Procedure Administered Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date of the last medication/treatment/therapy that was administered before protocol therapy, represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Procedure Agents Domain Prior Therapy Last Therapeutic Procedure Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to agents used as part of a procedure._An indicator that a person has been previously treated for the same condition or with the same therapy._Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to agents used as part of a procedure.

Concepts.definition: A domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to agents used as part of a procedure.

Property.preferredName: Prior Therapy Last Therapeutic Procedure Administered
Property.preferredDefinition: An indicator that a person has been previously treated for the same condition or with the same therapy.:Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: Prior action or administration of therapeutic agents that produced an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 2021-6-8 ak 12 Elevated to Standard per governance approval by RA. 11/18/18 TT released/MC.  11-19-18 TT changed max length. 11/9/18 TT changed Data Type from Character to Date and added Max Length for NCI Implementation of the standard. ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 65167 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.
